Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Renames the Nostrand Avenue train station on the Long Island Rail Road to the Chabad Lubavitch World Headquarters at Nostrand Avenue station
Summary: Directs the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Nostrand Avenue train station on the Long Island Rail Road, located in the borough of Brooklyn, to the Chabad Lubavitch World Headquarters at Nostrand Avenue station.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the metropolitan transportation authority to rename the Nostrand Avenue train station on the Long Island Rail Road to the Chabad Lubavitch World Headquarters at Nostrand Avenue station; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
